other_title: Code Geass Hangyaku no Lelouch: Nunnally in Wonderland (Japanese)
Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion - Nunnally in Wonderland
コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ：ナナリーinワンダーランド (Japanese)
plot: It's another Alice in Wonderland story when, while spending time with his sister one sunny day, Nunnally requests that Lelouch tells a story, like in old times. To grant his sister's request, Lelouch uses Geass on the entire cast of the Code Geass series.
insert_song: "All Hail Britannia!!!" by Hiroki Shimizu, Hiro Tanitomi & Katsuyuki Nakanishi
